org.web3j.rlp

Class RlpEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.web3j.rlp.RlpEncoder

  • public class RlpEncoder
extends java.lang.Object

    Recursive Length Prefix (RLP) encoder.

    For the specification, refer to p16 of the yellow paper and here.
